item.title: 对冲基金在九月份的表现
item.description: 据路透社周五报道，摩根大通周四的一份客户报告显示，9月份对冲基金的回报率为1.3%，其中欧洲、亚洲和中东地区的对冲基金经理的业绩优于北美地区的对冲基金经理。【原文：Hedge funds returned 1.3% in September, with managers in Europe, Asia and the Middle East outperforming their North American rivals, according to a JPMorgan client note on Thursday, seen by Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片公司 Cerebras Systems 申请撤回美国 IPO
item.description: 人工智能芯片公司 Cerebras Systems 周五申请撤回其在美国首次公开募股的计划，立即生效。【原文：AI chip firm Cerebras Systems on Friday filed to withdraw, effective immediately, its plans for an initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 主要民主党人抨击美国 "突然 "终止广受欢迎的包裹运输关税豁免政策
item.description: 美国参议院财政委员会的头号民主党人指责特朗普政府在终止美国对价值低于800美元的包裹的 "微量 "关税豁免时，海关程序不到位，导致美国购物者和小企业的邮件运输受到严重干扰。【原文：The top Democrat on the U.S. Senate Finance Committee accused the Trump administration of having inadequate customs procedures in place as it ended the "de minimis" U.S. tariff exemption for packages valued below $800, leading to severe disruptions in mail shipments to U.S. shoppers and small businesses.】

item.title: 联合太平洋机车工程师批准新的五年合同
item.description: 联合太平洋铁路公司（Union Pacific）机车工程师投票批准了与铁路运营商签订的为期五年的新合同，BLET-Teamsters 工会周五表示。【原文：Locomotive engineers at Union Pacific voted to ratify a new five-year contract with the railroad operator, the BLET-Teamsters union said on Friday.】

item.title: 巴西骗子在 Instagram 广告中使用吉赛尔-邦辰的深度假货，敛财数百万美元
item.description: 据警方调查人员称，巴西一伙涉嫌诈骗的人利用 Instagram 广告，以超级名模吉赛尔-邦辰（Gisele Bundchen）和其他名人的深度假照为特色，似乎通过网络诈骗赚取了数百万美元。【原文：A group of suspected scammers in Brazil using Instagram ads featuring deepfakes of supermodel Gisele Bundchen and other celebrities appears to have made millions of dollars through online fraud, according to police investigators.】

item.title: 艾伯维预计第三季度将产生 27 亿美元研发费用
item.description: 制药商艾伯维在周五提交的一份监管文件中表示，预计第三季度盈利将包括27亿美元的在研研发（IPR&D）费用。【原文：Drugmaker AbbVie in a regulatory filing on Friday said it expects third-quarter earnings to include a $2.7 billion charge related to in-process research and development (IPR&D) expenses.】

item.title: 暴风雨造成严重破坏后，丰田将恢复巴西两家工厂的生产
item.description: 日本汽车制造商丰田公司周五表示，在上个月因暴雨和大风造成停产后，位于巴西圣保罗州的两家工厂将恢复汽车生产。【原文：Japanese carmaker Toyota is set to resume vehicle production at two Brazilian plants, both in Sao Paulo state, after damages from heavy rain and winds halted operations last month, the company said on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道参议员称特朗普考虑大幅减免美国汽车生产关税
item.description: 共和党参议员伯尼-莫雷诺（Bernie Moreno）和汽车官员周五告诉路透社，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）正在考虑大幅减免美国汽车生产的关税，这将有效消除大型汽车公司正在支付的大部分成本。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is considering significant tariff relief for U.S. auto production that could effectively eliminate much of the costs major car companies are paying, Republican Senator Bernie Moreno and auto officials told Reuters Friday.】

item.title: 巴西 Weg 公司明年将向欧洲销售本地制造的电动汽车充电器
item.description: 巴西电机制造商 Weg 的高管们周五表示，该公司将于明年开始向同一市场销售欧洲制造的电动汽车电池充电器，同时还将加大在墨西哥的投资计划，以满足当地日益增长的电气零部件需求。【原文：Brazilian motor maker Weg is set to begin selling made-in-Europe EV battery chargers to that same market next year, while it also looks to ramp up planned investments in Mexico to meet rising demand for electrical parts there, executives said on Friday.】

item.title: 分析师称，海运费下降使承运商利润面临风险
item.description: 自美国总统唐纳德-特朗普今年早些时候对贸易伙伴征收一系列新关税以来，海运需求出现下滑，导致海运集装箱运价跌至 2024 年 1 月以来的最低点，威胁到马士基和赫伯罗特等主要承运商的利润。【原文：A slump in ocean shipping demand since U.S. President Donald Trump imposed a raft of new tariffs on trade partners earlier this year has helped send ocean container rates to their lowest since January 2024, threatening profits at major carriers including Maersk and Hapag-Lloyd.】

item.title: 黑客组织声称近 10 亿条 Salesforce 记录被盗
item.description: 与最近针对英国大型零售商的一系列勒索软件攻击有关的网络犯罪分子周五称，他们通过重点攻击使用云技术巨头 Salesforce 软件的公司，从 Salesforce 窃取了近 10 亿条记录。【原文：Cybercriminals connected to a recent string of ransomware attacks on major British retailers said on Friday they had stolen almost 1 billion records from cloud technology giant Salesforce by focusing on companies that use its software.】

item.title: 对于美国停摆中的就业日数据修复，专家们是这样说的
item.description: 由于美国联邦政府停摆，美国劳工统计局员工休假，该机构网站显示周三发布的数据为最新数据，而不是原定于周五发布的9月份月度就业报告。【原文：With U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics employees furloughed due to the federal government shutdown, the agency's website shows a release from Wednesday as its most recent data update instead of the monthly employment report for September that had been scheduled for Friday.】

item.title: 美国精神航空公司首席财务官称将裁减近 100 架飞机
item.description: 美国精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）首席财务官弗雷德-克罗默（Fred Cromer）周五在与债权人举行的虚拟会议上表示，作为破产保护下全面重组的一部分，该公司计划缩减近 100 架飞机，并退出美国不同市场。【原文：Spirit Airlines plans to shrink its fleet by nearly 100 aircraft and exit different U.S. markets as part of a sweeping restructuring under Chapter 11, CFO Fred Cromer said on Friday during a virtual meeting with creditors.】

item.title: 联合健康股东提议设立独立董事会主席
item.description: 一位联合健康（UnitedHealth）的股东周五提议，该医疗集团应采取一项政策，要求设立独立的董事会主席，目前这一职务由首席执行官斯蒂芬-赫姆斯利（Stephen Hemsley）担任。【原文：A UnitedHealth shareholder proposed on Friday that the healthcare group should adopt a policy to require an independent board chair, a role now held by CEO Stephen Hemsley.】

item.title: 美联储杰斐逊重申就业市场若无支持可能面临压力
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会副主席菲利普-杰斐逊周五重申，如果没有货币政策的支持，美国就业市场可能面临压力。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve Vice Chair Philip Jefferson reiterated on Friday that the U.S. job market could face stress if it is not supported by monetary policy.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称雪佛龙将出售价值 20 亿美元的科罗拉多州输油管资产
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，雪佛龙公司正在出售丹佛-朱尔斯堡页岩盆地的一系列管道资产，售价可能超过 20 亿美元。【原文：Chevron is selling a collection of pipeline assets in the Denver-Julesburg shale basin that are likely to fetch more than $2 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: KFF民调显示，大多数美国人支持延长《美国医疗保险法案》税收抵免期
item.description: 凯泽家庭基金会（KFF）周五进行的一项最新民意调查显示，近十分之八的美国人希望国会延长将于年底到期的《平价医疗法案》税收抵免优惠，即使议员们正就联邦支出问题争论不休。【原文：Nearly eight in 10 Americans want Congress to renew enhanced Affordable Care Act tax credits set to expire at year-end, even as lawmakers clash over federal spending, a new Kaiser Family Foundation (KFF) poll said on Friday.】

item.title: 明尼苏达州批准贝莱德收购，贝莱德基础设施业务再获助力
item.description: 明尼苏达州电力监管机构周五批准了贝莱德（BlackRock）和加拿大养老金计划（Canada Pension Plan）以 62 亿美元收购明尼苏达电力公司母公司 Allete 的计划，称双方最近的修改应能解决人们对费率和清洁电力投资的担忧。【原文：Minnesota power regulators on Friday approved a $6.2 billion plan for a BlackRock unit and Canada Pension Plan to buy utility Allete, parent of Minnesota Power, saying recent modifications by the parties should address concerns about rates and clean-power investments.】

item.title: 美联储主席米兰希望积极降息，但淡化与其他官员的分歧
item.description: 鉴于特朗普政府推动经济发生了巨大变化，美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）周五再次敦促采取积极的降息措施，同时认为他与央行同事之间的前景差距并不像有些人认为的那样大。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran on Friday again pressed for an aggressive path of rate cuts given big changes in the economy driven by the Trump administration, while at the same time arguing the gulf between his outlook and that of his central bank colleagues is not as great as some perceive it to be.】

item.title: 法官裁定，动视官员必须面对微软收购案的索赔要求
item.description: 特拉华州一名法官称，包括首席执行官鲍比-科蒂克在内的前动视暴雪公司官员必须面对大部分诉讼，这些诉讼指控他们在微软以 754 亿美元收购《使命召唤》游戏制造商时亏空了股东。【原文：A Delaware judge said former Activision Blizzard officials including Chief Executive Bobby Kotick must face most of a lawsuit alleging they shortchanged shareholders when Microsoft bought the "Call of Duty" game maker for $75.4 billion.】

item.title: 全球最大的私营企业
item.description: 据 Crunchbase 数据显示，本周早些时候，ChatGPT 母公司 OpenAI 的估值达到 5000 亿美元，巩固了其全球最有价值私营公司的地位。【原文：ChatGPT-parent OpenAI reportedly reached a valuation of $500 billion earlier this week, cementing its place as the most valuable privately held company in the world, according to Crunchbase data.】

item.title: 汇丰银行：近期黄金交易价格可能突破4000美元/盎司
item.description: 汇丰银行表示，受地缘政治风险、财政不确定性和美联储独立性受到威胁的影响，黄金近期的交易价格可能会超过每盎司4000美元。【原文：HSBC said gold could trade above $4,000 per ounce in the near term, driven by geopolitical risks, fiscal uncertainties, and threats to the Federal Reserve’s independence.】

item.title: 独家报道：巴蒂斯塔兄弟的 J&F 公司与法国电力集团洽谈巴西能源工厂事宜
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西亿万富翁巴蒂斯塔兄弟拥有的控股公司 J&F Investimentos SA 正在洽谈收购法国电力公司 EDF 的里约热内卢热电厂。【原文：J&F Investimentos SA, the holding company owned by Brazil's billionaire Batista brothers, is in talks to acquire French utility EDF's Rio de Janeiro thermal plant, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称，随着沙特和俄罗斯就石油规模展开辩论，欧佩克+将再次上调石油价格
item.description: 四位了解欧佩克+谈判的人士说，欧佩克+八国可能在周日进一步提高石油产量，该集团的领头羊沙特阿拉伯将推动大幅增产，以重新夺回市场份额，而俄罗斯则建议小幅增产。【原文：Eight OPEC+ countries are likely to further raise oil output on Sunday with the group’s leader Saudi Arabia pushing for a large increase to regain market share and Russia suggesting a more modest rise, four people with knowledge of OPEC+ talks said.】

item.title: 独家报道：亚马逊推出设备几天后就失去了设备副总裁和首席执行官精英顾问团成员
item.description: 就在亚马逊举办年度设备和服务展示会的几天后，亚马逊就失去了一位帮助监管该部门的副总裁。【原文：Just days after putting on its annual devices and services showcase, Amazon is losing a vice president who helps oversee the division.】

item.title: 受制裁影响的卢布支持代币赞助顶级加密大会
item.description: 本周在新加坡举行的一次重要加密货币会议上，俄罗斯人使用的卢布支持的加密货币需求飙升，该加密货币背后的企业也是会议的赞助商之一。【原文：The business behind a rouble-backed cryptocurrency targeted by U.S. sanctions was among the sponsors of a major crypto conference in Singapore this week, as demand soars for the token, used by Russians.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士：塞内加尔不会在周五的会议上获得国际货币基金组织（IMF）的豁免以清算更多现金
item.description: 两位接近此事的消息人士告诉路透社，国际货币基金组织不打算在周五讨论塞内加尔债务误报豁免问题的董事会会议上进行表决。【原文：The International Monetary Fund isn't planning to vote on a crucial debt misreporting waiver for Senegal during its Friday board meeting at which the matter will be discussed, two sources close to the matters told Reuters.】

item.title: 博雅全球研究公司将美联储降息预期从 12 月下调至 10 月
item.description: 美国银行全球研究部周五将美联储下一次降息的预期从12月提前至10月，理由是劳动力市场出现疲软迹象。【原文：Bank of America Global Research on Friday pulled forward its forecast for the next Federal Reserve interest rate cut to October from December, citing signs of a softening labor market.】

item.title: 美国服务业停滞不前，新订单放缓，就业疲软
item.description: 由于新订单急剧放缓，9 月份美国服务业活动停滞不前，而就业低迷则进一步证明，由于劳动力供需减弱，劳动力市场状况低迷。【原文：U.S. services sector activity stalled in September amid a sharp slowdown in new orders, while subdued employment added to mounting evidence of sluggish labor market conditions because of waning demand and supply of workers.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称，国家产业政策可能有效，但也存在风险
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）周五表示，越来越多的国家正在寻求利用对特定企业和部门的公共支持来重塑经济，但补贴和其他产业政策可能代价高昂，除非谨慎利用，否则可能不会有效。【原文：More countries are seeking to reshape their economies using public support for specific firms and sectors, but subsidies and other industrial policies can be costly and may not be effective unless carefully utilized, the IMF said on Friday.】
